short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The stage - Best deals for your favorite shows and concerts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The stage new tab extension will assist you to find the best seats at live events, shows, exhibitions, sports games,  concerts, festivals and comedy shows.

By installing "The Stage" extension, you agree to the EULA and Privacy Policy, and to set your new tab page to The Stage Tab.

The search features used within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing. However, the extension will not make any changes in your default browser search setting.


Privacy Policy: https://the-stage.live/privacy-policy/

EULA/Terms of Service: https://the-stage.live/end-user-license-agreement/
